WelcomeText: We Are connecting to pepople between rural family and City Dwellers of Whole Myanmar
Goal: Only if poverty can be reduced for  rural family, we can make easy to solve our business solution The Main Fact to reduce poverty of the rural is to get Daily Earning for their life.	For example there is poultry.	You can get egg daily and so can get earning daily.	When you get the eggs , you have to make small bites who made by rural ladies which is consistent with the Gender Equality. And men are farming and making poultry. Other family, Other villagers also grow maize seeds for poultry, which will be in line with income.
GoalMessage: The aim of Digital MM Farm is to create equitable equities for city dwellers and rural family.
HowWorksText: Not only farmers but also ordinary account holders can submit projects.In a project, you can choose to place either agricultural or livestock. Then we will reply back to you before the Project Expired date.
FirstStep: 1st, Craeting Project By Farmers Or Our Customers by Our Platform
SecondStep: 2nd, Contact Your Project And Our Staffs will check everything you okay
ThirdStep: 3rd, Working Duration ( Farming or Animal Husbandry ) of Project Get Money By Percentage
FourthStep: 4th, After Work Done, You will Get Secure 100% Get Money. You Can Get Recommend.
DontWorryText: Our staff are self-explanatory and easy to reach in the nearest rural villages. Meetings are usually held once a month.
DontWorryCall: This No can be called to explain you everything you want to know.
